comments:
Latest CVS as of 20020211.

I got the following error when I try to launch. From the JavaDoc on
Widget#checkWidget():
* It is an error to call a method on a widget that
* has been disposed or to call a method on a widget
* from a thread that is different from the thread
* that created the widget.

Looking at the code, this has been fixed. All breakpoint change notification is 
processed asynchronously in the UI thread.
